Package ui

Class TerminalHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.TerminalHandler
  • public class TerminalHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the JLine terminal and orchestrates user interaction.

                throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        keyHandler - The key handler for user input.
        printHandler - The print handler for printing to the terminal.
        resizeHandler - The resize handler for when the user resizes the terminal window.

      • getNextChar

        public int getNextChar​(int timeout)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the next character from the input reader with a timeout. If the timeout is reached then -2 is returned. In this case the Reader thread is kept and reused the next time the method is called. While waiting for result still check for resizes and redraw as appropriate.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The read character.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Sets the exit field to true.

         throws java.io.IOException
        Main program loop.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.

        public void draw()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Get the string to draw from the print handler and draw it.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.

      • getInput

        public boolean getInput()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Overload method to call getInput(int) with unlimited timeout.
        Returns:
        Boolean; true if the program should exit.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.

      • getInput

        public boolean getInput​(int timeout)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets an input using getNextChar(int) and passes it to the key handler. The key handler is set to the result of this. The terminal window is then drawn.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Boolean; true if the program should exit.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.

      • await

        public boolean await​(BlockingThread thread)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Checks user input while waiting for a BlockingThread to complete.
        Parameters:
        thread - The BlockingThread to run.
        Returns:
        Boolean; rue if the thread completed successfully.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.

      • checkResize

        private void checkResize()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Checks if the terminal window has been resized by the user. Also performs garbage collection frequently as this game creates a large number of objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Pass exception up chain.
